q: has recalled being attacked by his Tourist co-star Angelina Jolie 's pet bulldog Jacques. The Sun quotes Johnny Depp as saying that the trouble began when he agreed to babysit the dog against his better judgment. Foolishly I was persuaded to look after Jacques for a night. He's a huge bulldog, he said.`` At first I had a terrible feeling, because Jacques smelt horrible.'' The MTV Movie Award winner further remarked that it didn't take long for the animal to act up.
